recipes.recipeDescription: A delicious and flavorful chicken curry that will warm you up on a cold night.
cookingMethod: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes.
Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
Add the onion, garlic, and ginger to the skillet and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
Add the curry powder, cumin, coriander, salt, and pepper to the skillet and stir to combine.
Add the coconut milk and stir to combine.
Return the chicken to the skillet and bring to a simmer.
Cover and cook for 10-15 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
Serve over rice and enjoy!

recipes.recipeDescription: A delicious and flavorful chicken curry that will warm you up on a cold night.
cookingMethod: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes.
Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
Add the onion, garlic, and ginger to the skillet and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
Add the curry powder, cumin, coriander, salt, and pepper to the skillet and stir to combine.
Add the coconut milk and stir to combine.
Return the chicken to the skillet and bring to a simmer.
Cover and cook for 10-15 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
Serve over rice and enjoy!
